title: Advances in Physical Sciences
title-note: Translation of a Soviet journal, published in Israel 1957-1958
additional-note: This is a journal published in Israel, containing translations of articles originally published in a Russian journal. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Iren Sokolova for copyright research on this title.
